attributes.action: make Fuelpods and any other retail biofuel processor VAT exempt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government claims it wants a greener Britain. Apparently so long as it can make money out of it, yes.

If you produce less that 2500 litres of biofuel for personal use, per annum, you do not need to register with HMRC. Well done - a step forwards, at least. 

The problem is few commercial outlets produce biofuel. Home biofuel processors are now available to purchase - fantastic! They are, however, somewhat expensive: £2500. I would consider purchasing a processor for this price. But! £2500 + VAT = nearly £3000! This is not acceptable and does not encourage greener living.

If the government wants its green credentials to remain, then such biofuel processors need to be VAT exempt.

To the public: please do the right thing by signing this petition.

To the government: please do the right thing by making the above mentioned VAT exempt.

Greener Britain, Greener World.
